And if you ever try and cross me again you'll be sorry. My next movie is gonna be a grandiose step up from this slasher shit! It's a film written and directed by John Sayles.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Oh poor John. There's not gonna be another film. Well, at least not for you.

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Hold on Gale, I'm a pro at this.

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Oh Dewey I'm sorry.

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Here. Let me --

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Excuse me Gale! What the hell do you think you're doing?

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Let's get this drawer open. If it's locked, there must be something inside he's trying to hide.

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Shit. That's gonna leave a mark.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: What? What'd you find?

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Paternity test results. Christ Dewey, you're never going to believe who Milton's kid is.

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Who is it?

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Guys! I got a bad feeling.

Speaker: jennifer
Dialogue: Guys there's someone else in the fucking room!

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Huh?

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Gale run!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Dewey!

Speaker: detective kincaid
Dialogue: Jesus Gale what happened?

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: DEWEY! Dewey's in there too! He needs medical help! He's hurt!

Speaker: detective kincaid
Dialogue: Alright, calm down. I'm going to radio in for backup right now.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: I wouldn't run if I were you Gale. It's only gonna end up with you getting Skewered like a fucking pig. I need you.

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Awfully late time to be doing an interview.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: I need you as bait. For Sidney.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Hello?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Who is this?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Um wh-who's calling?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Gale, Dewey, whoever, um, call me back, I can only hear myself.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: { a click } I only her you too, Sidney.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Who is this?

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: The question isn't who I am.  The question is, who's with me.

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Sidney, stay away!

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Don't do it!  If you do one thing to attract attention, one thing, I'll kill them both. Now, do you have somewhere we can be alone?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Yes.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Go there.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Always hard being friends with you, Sidney. When you're friends with Sidney, you die! Well these friends don't have to, Sidney. It's up to you.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: How do I know their voices are --

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Are real?  How do you know you're not hearing things? How do you know I'm not someone in your head? Somewhere, you know.

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Don't come here Sidney!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Dewey! No!

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Or do you?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: You're dead!

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: I don't want them, I want you!  It's simple. You show yourself, they survive, you run, they die!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Oh God!  Oh God!

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: Don't you want to know Sidney? Don't you want to know who killed her?  Don't you want to know who killed your mother?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Where?

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: She'd have been so happy, Sidney, to know we'd be together.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: WHERE?

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: I'll call you, when you're on your way.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Fuck!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: You follow directions good. Now let's wrap this production. Go to the Sunrise Studios backlot. I'll call you when you get there.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Alright, I'm here. Now what?

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: You're doing real good. Can't you figure it out? I wanna finish this where it all began. Woodsboro.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: I thought you wanted me here?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Alright I'm here, now show your  face so we can finish this.

Speaker: voice
Dialogue: It's good to see you again Sidney. I was growing real impatient. Go ahead. Explore. I'll catch up with you later.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Yeah?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Dewey?! OHMIGOD! Where are you?!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Where are you Dewey?

Speaker: ghost
Dialogue: You play a good game Sidney. Now it's time to get down to business.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Who are you?

Speaker: ghost
Dialogue: Your other half.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: GALE!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Christ Sidney hurry up! That fucking lunatic is coming!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Gale he's got Dewey!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: I know! He killed Kincaid!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: I know!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Let's get out of here!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: GALE WATCHOUT!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Jesus Christ Sidney get out of here! He can't get us both!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: RUNNN!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Dewey!

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Where's Gale?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: They've got her!

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Sid I want you to stay here! I'll be right back! I'm not gonna let them get Gale!

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Hold it right there you fucker!

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: OH shit!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Oh God.

Speaker: angelina
Dialogue: Time to sort things out. Whatta you say?

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: It's you?! All of this is because of you?

Speaker: angelina
Dialogue: No. Not all of it. Sid, someone really wants to meet you.

Speaker: angelina
Dialogue: Uh-un Sid. You're not gonna run off. Not now.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Who the hell are you?

Speaker: the ghost
Dialogue: The other half of you! I searched for a mother too, an actress named Rina Reynolds. I tried to find her my whole life. And four years ago I actually tracked her down, knocked on her door, thinking she'd welcome me back with open arms, but she had a new life and a new name, Maureen Prescott! You were the only child she claimed Sidney. She shut me out in the cold forever, her own son!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: All the nightmares. All the hell I went through was because of you, you spineless bastard!

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: I'm a director Sid, I direct. For example, Angelina over there,  She's my partner. I can convince her to do anything.  We've been dating since I met her in Woodsboro.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Oh my God, Angie Crick? From English class?

Speaker: angelina
Dialogue: That's me Sid. I always idolized you. You were always my hero. That's why I'm here Sidney. I wanted to make you proud.

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: And I kinda keep her around cause it's a bit of a turn-on. You know, in the movies she's you Sid, so every time I jump her bones, I'm doing YOU, technically.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Listen, I have no time for this. I've heard this shit before! So lets get on with it!

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: Wait a second Sid. Don't you go jumping the gun. You haven't seen the best part.  Ain't it cool? Listen to what the police are gonna find next to your lifeless, mutilated body.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: I can't take it anymore. This Hollywood exploitation of the nightmare I lived has to be stopped. I did this to make you all repent for your sins, and now I'm pleased I've got my message across. Good-bye.

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: Awesome. What'd I tell ya? Heh. Did youknow that John Milton, was my daddy? Yep, he's the one who fucked mommy dearest in the long run. His parties, his flings, exploited the Hollywood nobody! That's whyI had to make him pay. Daddy dearest is dead. Mommy's dead. Looks like I'm an orphan all alone in this world. What a good reason to -- STAB MYSELF!

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: See Sidney, as amateur as Billy and Stu were, they laid the groundwork for this! See Sidney, they also set the stage for you! Introducing to the world Sidney the victim! Sidney the survivor! Sidney the star!

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: See Sid, now comes the part where we get away with it! The part where we win! Cause face it Sidney, in this world, the bad guys win!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Roman knock it off! Do you people even know why you kill people? You kill people cause you choose to and not because of any other fucking reason!

Speaker: angelina
Dialogue: Roman make her stop! Make her stop baby she's freaking me out!

Speaker: roman
Dialogue: God damn it Sidney!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: Hey bitch, don't ever use prop cuffs to restrain Gale Weathers.

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: I know all the tricks!

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: Dewey my God I thought you were dead.

Speaker: dewey
Dialogue: Don't worry Sid I'd never leave you like that.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: DEWEY! IT'S GALE!

Speaker: gale
Dialogue: THIS IS FOR THE STARDOM I NEVER HAD! BITCH!

Dialogue: Watch out Sid. Randy said the killer's always superhuman.

Speaker: sidney
Dialogue: He wasn't superhuman Dewey. He wasn't superhuman at all.

Dialogue: WHOA! HOLY SHIT IS THIS GONNA MAKE A GOOD BOOK!

Dialogue: This shit is really getting repetitive, you know?

Dialogue: Gale, I know this is a bad time and all but what if we try it out again. The whole relationship thing.

Dialogue: Sure, why not. You did Save my life,Mr. Rielly.

Dialogue: Jesus Christ what happened? I leave for two seconds to take my kid to the doctor, I come back and it's the fucking WILD BUNCH.

Dialogue: It was just something that's been itching to be completed for the past four years.

Dialogue: I guess so.
